title: Earlier Sign-In
description: Sign-in wasn’t always at 9:30pm (and 8pm on Sundays). Was the change effective?

questions.text: What is your opinion on this year’s shift to earlier sign-in times?
questions.description: Last year, sign-in on Monday, Tuesday, and Wednesday was 10:00 PM and sign-in on Sunday was 9:30pm.

questions.text: Do you believe that you get more sleep with 9:30pm sign-in than you would if sign-in were at 10:00pm?
questions.description: Day students are not allowed on campus after sign-in.

questions.text: How does earlier sign-in affect your relationship with your house counselor/house complement(s)?
How does earlier sign-in affect your ability to socialize?

options.text: It improves my ability to socialize
It harms my ability to socialize
